title: Passo by Beyond
description_en:
• Payment Plan: 60% during construction, 40% on handover
  • Handover: Q4 2026
  • Highlight: Private pools on the balcony & direct beach access
  • Location: Premium Palm Jumeirah waterfront living
description_de:
• Zahlungsplan: 60% während Bauzeit, 40% bei Übergabe
  • Übergabe: Q4 2026
  • Highlight: Private Pools auf dem Balkon & direkter Strandzugang
  • Lage: Premium Wasserfront auf Palm Jumeirah
description_sq:
• Plani i Pagesës: 60% gjatë ndërtimit, 40% në dorëzim
  • Dorëzimi: Q4 2026
  • Veçori: Pishina private në ballkon dhe akses direkt në plazh
  • Vendndodhja: Premium Palm Jumeirah pranë detit

title: Samana Hills South Phase 3
description_en:
• Payment Plan: 1% monthly installments (5 years)
  • Handover: Q4 2026
  • Highlight: Apartments with private pools
  • Investment: High ROI potential through short-term rental
description_de:
• Zahlungsplan: 1% monatliche Raten (5 Jahre)
  • Übergabe: Q4 2026
  • Highlight: Apartments mit privaten Pools
  • Investment: Hohes ROI-Potenzial durch Kurzzeitvermietung
description_sq:
• Plani i Pagesës: 1% këste mujore (5 vjet)
  • Dorëzimi: Q4 2026
  • Veçori: Apartamente me pishina private
  • Investim: Potencial i lartë ROI përmes qirasë afatshkurtër

title: Palm Central Private Residences
description_en: Resort-style coastal living between Frond M and N. Stepped architecture maximizing sea views. Direct beach access and infinity pools.
description_de: Resort-Stil Küstenleben zwischen Frond M und N. Abgestufte Architektur für maximale Meeresaussicht. Direkter Strandzugang und Infinity-Pools.
description_sq: Jetë bregdetare në stil resort midis Frond M dhe N. Arkitekturë me shkallë që maksimizon pamjet e detit. Akses direkt në plazh dhe pishina infinity.
